rule: The response must not include more than one word under any circumstances.
validityText:
The input is a JSON-like structure with a "sentence" and a "word" key. The sentence "Un grand arbre pousse ici." is a grammatically valid string and does not contain special characters or symbols. The word "arbre" is a substring of the sentence. The word does not contain punctuation. Thus, the input complies with the input specification.
OK
coverageEvalText:
The chatbot output consists of a single word "NOUN". The description requires the chatbot to return just the part-of-speech tag, and the provided output does exactly that. It doesn't include any extra text or explanations, and it is a valid part-of-speech tag as listed in the description.
OK
